mapper.insert: INSERT INTO userAsset (userID, cash, stock, property, deposit, consume, loanAmount, loanPurpose, period) VALUES (#{userID}, #{cash}, #{stock}, #{property}, #{deposit}, #{consume}, #{loanAmount}, #{loanPurpose},#{period})
mapper.update: UPDATE userAsset SET cash = #{cash}, stock = #{stock}, property = #{property}, deposit = #{deposit}, consume = #{consume}, loanAmount = #{loanAmount}, loanPurpose = #{loanPurpose}, period = #{period} WHERE userID = #{userID}
